title: godoc/static: error executing template search.txt
body:
What version of Go are you using (go version)?

1.4.2 & tip (go:d68f52a tools:264bffc)

    What operating system and processor architecture are you using?

linux/amd64

    What did you do?

http://golang.org/search?q=UnmarshalText&m=text
http://localhost:6060/search?q=UnmarshalText&m=text

    What did you expect to see?

search results rendered as text

    What did you see instead?

search result broken, error logged:

    searchText.Execute: template: search.txt:26:12: executing "search.txt" at <$val.Idents>: can't evaluate field Idents in type []godoc.Ident
